titles.title: To amend the Federal Rules of Criminal Procedure to allow motions for a new trial at any time where the error alleged is a violation of constitutional rights.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime.

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

bill.summary: 9/5/2001--Introduced. Amends rule 33 of the Federal Rules of Criminal Procedure to allow a motion for a new trial based on a violation of constitutional rights to be made at any time.
